text: Despised Icon is a Canadian deathcore band formed in 2002. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Consumed by Your Poison (2002) * The Healing Process (2005) * The Ills of Modern Man (2007) * Day of Mourning (2009) * Beast (2016) * Purgatory (2019) ==References== Category:Deathcore bands Category:Death metal bands Category:Metalcore bands Category:Musical groups established in 2002
title: Despised Icon
